events.message: I would like to request a refund for the item I purchased last week because it did not match the description.
The customer's request has been classified under the 'Refund' category following their description of wanting money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry for this customer case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting our support team. I understand you'd like a refund. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also specify the reason for the refund request and whether the item has been used or opened?
The order number is #548732. The product arrived damaged and I havenâ€™t used it at all. I want my money back immediately.
We can process your refund right away. Please return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the item back tomorrow.
Your refund has been fully processed and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund was successful and the customer has no further questions, this support case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
